snippet.title: FingFing Trailer | VR FingFing | VRFingFing | The Headers | Ababa Band
snippet.description:
1. Steam VR: http://store.steampowered.com/app/2660300/FingFing
2. Meta VR:  https://www.meta.com/ko-kr/experiences/6526112794179970

"FingFing" a VR healing puzzle game played entirely with your fingers

When you press your finger on the ground, the character moves with a "Fing" sound.
This is the only control in this game, you don't need a controller, just "Fing" the ground with your index finger, and you can clear all the stages of the game.

You can unlock 6 cute characters, and you can choose the main character for each stage.
You can play a total of 300 stages. when you clear the last stage, you can watch a concert of the 6 characters.

"FingFing" is organized into four categories of games.
Crossing the road, Find the maze, Block floor, Memorization

Immerse yourself in a casual puzzle game filled with cute spaces and cute characters. Master the art of finger movement and challenge yourself with increasingly complex levels.

1. Crossing the road
2. Find the maze
3. Block floor
4. Memorization
